1.title: Home Sweet Decker
1.plot: Now parents to two toddlers, Eric & Jessie are busier than ever with bustling careers and new ventures. And after a string of injuries, Eric hopes for a clean bill of health from his doctors.

2.title: What Happens in Vegas
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Southern Charm
3.plot: Eric, Jessie reunite at their Nashville home where Jessie gets back to work recording her new single. Eric receives some shocking news that will change the Deckers' lives.

4.title: Girls Night Out
4.plot: As Eric is still reeling from the shock of being cut from his team, Jessie receives some upsetting news of her own. Determined to show everyone what they're made of, Eric gets back in the gym while Jessie delivers a fun, powerful performance for her fans at the City Winery in Nashville.

5.title: Master Pranksters

6.title: Home Is Where the Heart Is

7.title: Christmas in July
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: There's No Place Like Home
8.plot: On the season finale, Jessie is honored to be asked back to perform at the Grand Ole Opry, this time with her family in tow. Sydney's baby shower is quickly approaching, but she questions whether Jessie is as prepared as she claims she is.

1.title: Home Sweet Denver
1.plot: In the series premiere, Jessie has a final fitting for her wedding dress, while Eric stresses over a possible football trade.

2.title: Whoa Baby!
2.plot: It's five weeks until the Decker wedding and Eric has babies on the brain! But is Jessie ready for kids, or focused solely on her music career?

3.title: Double Date Disaster
3.plot: Jessie sets her sister up on a group date. Plus, she and Eric jet off to the Dominican Republic.

4.title: Fling Before the Ring
4.plot: Jessie and Eric get ready for one last fling of fun as a non-married couple. Eric and his boys head off to Lake Tahoe, while the girls jet set to Miami. While in Tahoe, the boys devise a plan to have an MVP of the weekend--but with all that drinking, crazy things might happen! Then, Jessie's gal pals think that she needs to find the sexiest outfit for her wedding night. Meanwhile, Jessie struggles to find the next step in her career and stresses over wedding details that haven't been taken care. However, Jessie's mom comes to her rescue!

5.title: Mr. & Mrs. Decker
5.plot: Eric and Jessie's big day is finally here! But, will their Colorado wedding go off without a hitch? Find out why Jessie finds herself in tears just hours before walking down the aisle. Plus, will Eric's northern family take to Jessie's southern traditions? Then, see the beautiful surprise of a lifetime that Jessie has in store for Eric! First comes love, then comes marriage--could next be a baby carriage? Find out!

6.title: Boudoir Bride
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Triple Decker
1.plot: In the season premiere, Jessie's due date is fast approaching! Meanwhile, Eric's chances of making it to the Super Bowl are becoming a reality as the parents-to-be prepare for some major life changes.

2.title: Shower Me with Germs
2.plot: Even on an off week, the Deckers catch something! While Eric Decker prepares for Super Bowl XLVIII, Jessie rushes off to L.A. to finish her album before their baby girl arrives. But the recording session goes south when mommy starts to come down with the flu. With friends and family gathering in Nashville for an elegant baby shower, can Jessie muster the strength to join her guests for the special day--or will she be stuck upstairs in bed with H1N1?

3.title: We're Going to the Super Bowl!
3.plot: Jessie and her family pack their bags for New York City and Super Bowl XLVIII! While the press, swag and charter plane are amazing, being apart from her hubby is really bringing Jessie down. Will she be able to steal some kisses before the big game after two weeks apart? And before they know it, it's game time and a disappointing finish to Eric's season. See how his loving wife helps Eric get over the bitterness of defeat.

4.title: Back in Action
4.plot: With the football season over, the Deckers can finally focus all their attention on the arrival of a baby girl! That means going through all the baby shower gifts, building baby's first crib and even writing a sweet little lullaby. Then, as Jessie struggles with her ballooning belly, Eric prepares a surprise to raise her spirits and keep her feeling sexy. Plus, Sydney takes a breakup really hard. Can Jessie offer some sisterly advice to cheer her up?

5.title: Contracts and Contractions
5.plot: It's a toss-up between Eric getting his next contract and Jessie's due date arriving first. Can the mommy-to-be handle the added pressure while her pregnancy wears on? Meanwhile, Eric keeps himself occupied by enrolling in Daddy Boot Camp with his buddies. The free agent has a lot to learn! Plus, with Sidney back on the market, she and DT pick back up their friendly flirtations. And finally, what happens when the Decker baby gets impatient?

6.title: Oh Baby!
6.plot: Free agency arrives and the Deckers have no idea where they'll be living next season. But the Jets come calling and one trip to New York convinces Eric that he's found his family's new home. Then, after 9 1/2 months, Jessie's doctor says their baby girl is finally ready to arrive. At the hospital, though, Jessie's labor starts to stall. Will the mommy-to-be get a C-section? Finally, Eric and Jessie get to meet Vivianne Rose Decker. See the wonderful moment!

imdb.title: Eric & Jessie: Game On
plot: The Deckers try to juggle family, fame, and football.
